wikitext.*:
[[Image:ARES Games Logo.jpg|thumb|ARES Games Logo|]]

'''ARES Games''' is an Italian company established in 2011. They focus on a wide variety of board and card game products, including their licensed "War of the Ring" line of board and card games, primarily focused on games that allow players to re-enact political and military events from [[The Hobbit]] and [[The Lord of the Rings]].

== Products related to Tolkien and Middle-earth ==
*[[War of the Ring: Second Edition (2011 board game)]]
*[[The Battle of Five Armies (2014 board game)]]
*[[Hunt for the Ring (2017 board game)]]
*[[War of the Ring: The Card Game]]
